name: Nancy Drew®: Danger on Deception Island
description: Plunge into Danger to Bring a Mysterious Island’s Secrets to the Surface!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows® 98/ME/2000/XP/Vista Processor: 200MHz CPU Memory: 16MB RAM Graphics: 16-bit graphics video card DirectX®: 7.0 or higher Hard Drive: 200MB of free space Sound: 16-bit sound card

reviews.review_text: I was finally able to beat this game! This was the first Nancy Drew game I ever played. My parents got this for me when I was a kid and I never finished it until now because the disk no longer runs on my computer.  I enojyed the story and enjoyed the puzzles, although some of them required a bit of back and forth. I would recommend this game, despite its lack of replayability.

Although not one of my favorite Nancy Drew adventures, this is still a fun game that really offers you a challenge. I feel as though these games are not recognized well enough in the gaming community. This title does not deliver, in terms of fear, as much as some of the other entries, however, I still am tense and on the edge of my seat through out. The ending delivers just like every Nancy Drew game does. I strongly recommend this game.
